features: Suave Smoothing with Cocoa Butter & Shea Body Lotion is a lotion with cocoa butter and Shea that provides 24 hour moisturization
Suave Smoothing Cocoa Butter and Shea Lotion softens rough, dry skin
For skin that looks and feels unbelievably soft and smooth
body.description: Product Description Clinically Proven to moisturize as well as L'occitane Shea Butter Extra-Gentle Lotion. Our Suave Skin Solutions Smoothing Body Lotion with Cocoa Butter & Shea is enriched with a mix of nutrients, which are known to enhance the moisturization of the layers of skin and improve texture. The result is a skin that looks and feels unbelievably soft and smooth. This dermatologist tested moisturizer instantly relieves dryness to soften rough, dry skin and replenishes moisture to make your skin look and feel beautifully smooth. HOW TO USE For unbelievably soft and smooth skin, apply a generous amount with fingertips, and massage in gently with a soothing, circular motion. There's a Suave for every skin need. Suave Skin Solutions Body Lotions are designed to moisturize as well as premium skin care variants and provide 24 hour moisturization benefits. See each pack for more details. Choose from our wide range of moisturizing lotions that best caters to your skin care needs : Advanced Theapy for severely dry skin, Smoothing with Cocoa Butter and Shea, Soothing with Aloe, revitalizing with Vitamin E and Silkening with Baby Oil. Enjoy beautiful soft skin every day with Suave. What's in the Box Suave Skin Solutions Smoothing with Cocoa Butter & Shea Body Lotion, 18 Fluid Ounces. From the Manufacturer Suave Skin Therapy Cocoa Butter with Shea Moisturizer, enriched with nature's moisturizers cocoa and shea butters, this special formula smoothes and softens rough dry skin. Smoothies flaking skin, firms skin to improve tone. Never greasy formula absorbs quickly & easily into skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our nourishing lotion is made with pure Cocoa and Shea Butter, enriched with a unique blend of nutrients that are known to enhance the moisturization of the layers of skin and improve texture. The result is skin that looks and feels unbelievably soft and smooth. Suave brand – Listed as animal test–free by PETA's Beauty Without Bunnies program, 2022

Cruelty-Free Globally, Suave does not test on animals and is Certified Cruelty-Free by PETA. Unbelievably Soft And Smooth Skin The formula of our Suave Body Lotions leaves skin looking and feeling unbelievably soft and smooth. Suave Skin Solutions Enjoy all-day moisture with our range of lotions in your favorite scents for every skin need. Suave. Beauty With Benefits Whatever you and your families' haircare, skin or hygiene needs, you can have complete confidence that Suave products will help you boost your mind, body and spirit.

Suave Skin Solutions Smoothing Rose & Argan Oil Extract Lotion, 18 oz Suave Skin Solutions Lavendar Calming Lotion, 18 oz Suave Skin Solutions 100% Natural Almond Oil & Shea Butter Lotion, 32 oz Main Benefit Our smoothing lotion is infused with Rose & Argan Oil extract. Enriched with a unique blend of nutrients, which are known to enhance the moisturization of the layers of skin and improve texture. This lavendar lotion soothes dry skin with a calming, long-lasting fragrance. Its formula is perfectly designed to glide on easily, absorb quickly, and leave skin super smooth. This body lotion is infused with 100% natural almond and shea butter extracts, which are known for their rich conditioning properties.
Suave brand – Listed as animal test–free by PETA's Beauty Without Bunnies program, 2022

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Suave lotion is a great product for how it moisturizes and for a delightful fragrance. This multi-pack purchase let me stock up all my guest rooms and guest bathrooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I was born with dry skin over 75 years ago. My dead skin flakes could fill gallons jars. I have used a lot of different lotions, none very satisfactory. A friend told me about the Suave Cocoa Shea Nourishing Lotion. So much better, so much less expensive, and it smells good, too. I've been converted!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars suave makes a great lotion
reviews.reviewText: very nice on your skin, and smells great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Soft scent, nice and creamy. Received order much quicker than expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Suave creates a decent cocoa butter lotion
reviews.reviewText: It’s a cheap lotion. It does the job. It is not super thick and high-quality, but it hydrates the skin just fine. It also smells nice. If you need a lot of lotion for cheap, this is a great option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What does dry skin REJECT! - Suave Skin Solutions Body Lotion
reviews.reviewText: Having problems trying to pick up that needle or pin, your problem is probably dry fingers! Sauve Skin Solutions Body Lotion is the answer. Moisturized those fingers, palm and thumb. Why not take it all over the body! Men this is a solution to flaky, dry, chapped skin. Try it once and you'll understand why I purchased four (4) 18 fluid ounce bottles!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It has a sticky feel after
reviews.reviewText: It moisturized but it leaves a sticky feel when it’s getting ready to dry

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love this lotion. I have allergies to many different things but this is one lotion I can use. It's smells great and for the quality and quantity you get, it is worth the money.
